recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Manajemen Industri, Teknik Elektronika Industri, Teknik Manajemen Industri, Teknologi Industri (Sarjana)
job_description:
This position will support Continuous Improvement activities in the Quality Department.

Your daily tasks will include assisting in:
1. Streamlining Data Collection. Collecting, updating, and organizing data to support analysis and continuous improvement projects.
2. Refining Manpower Calculations. Assisting in manpower analysis, workload calculation, and efficiency tracking.
3. Optimizing Inspections and Asset Management. Supporting inspection scheduling, asset monitoring, and documentation accuracy.
4. Enhancing Document & Guidance Management. Updating SOPs, work instructions, and quality documents to ensure accuracy and compliance.
